ly.priv.mobile

Class JsObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • ly.priv.mobile.JsObject

  • public class JsObject
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a bridge between the Js of the Posting Applications and the native Android functions.
    Author:
    Shivam Verma
